title: Best of The Herd: 07/27/2018
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 07/27/2018
description:
Colin puts to rest the debate over multiple suitors for LeBron, stating he already had plans on moving to LA considering his recent business ventures within the first sixteen days of living in LA. Johnny Manziel shows his true colors yet again trying to defend Jimmy Garoppolo. And Tom Brady is the entire backbone of the New England Patriots and they have no identity without him.  Plus FSR weekend host and NBA analyst Chris Mannix stops by. Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
